content: 8 point granny round ripple by julee fort materials approx 40 ozs worsted weight yarn i used h but you can use any size hook tapestry needle special stitches sc3tog insert hook into stitch and pull up a loop in next 3 sts yarn over pull through all 3 loops on hook shell 3 double_crochet ch2 3 double_crochet in specified space important abbreviations to know beg beginning single_crochet single_crochet space space chain chain double_crochet double_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch pattern note some rnds have pictures to go with these pictures will help explain what i mean when i refer to the valleys and hills that make this ripple afghan round 1 make a loop ch3 double_crochet in loop ch2 3 double_crochet in loop ch2 3times double_crochet in loop slip_stitch in top of beg ch3 and in next double_crochet and ch2 space 12 double_crochet 4 ch2 sps round 2 ch3 2 double_crochet ch2 3 double_crochet in same ch2 space as slip_stitch ch2 shell in next ch2 space ch2 3 times slip_stitch in top of beg ch3 and in next 2 double_crochet and ch2 space 24 double_crochet 4 ch2 sps 4 ch2 sps round 3 ch3 2 double_crochet ch2 3 double_crochet in same ch2 space as slip_stitch ch1 shell ch1 in each ch2 space around slip_stitch in top of beg ch3 and in next 2 double_crochet and ch2 space 48 double_crochet 8 ch1 sps 8 ch2 sps round 4 ch3 2 double_crochet ch2 3 double_crochet in same ch2 space as slip_stitch ch1 single_crochet in next ch1 space ch1 shell in next ch2 space 7 times ch1 single_crochet in next ch1 space ch1 slip_stitch in top of beg ch3 and next 2 double_crochet and ch2 space 48 double_crochet 16 ch1 sps 8 ch2 sps round 5 ch3 2 double_crochet ch2 3 double_crochet in same ch2 space as slip_stitch ch1 double_crochet in next single_crochet ch1 shell in next ch2 space ch1 double_crochet in next single_crochet ch1 7 times ch1 slip_stitch in top of beg ch3 and next 2 double_crochet and ch2 space 56 double_crochet 16 ch1 sps 8 ch2 sps round 6 ch3 2 double_crochet ch2 3 double_crochet in same ch2 space as slip_stitch ch1 3 double_crochet in next ch1 space 2 times ch1 shell in next ch2 ch1 3 double_crochet in next ch1 space 2 times ch1 7 times ch1 slip_stitch in top of beg ch3 and in next 2 double_crochet and ch2 space 96 double_crochet 24 ch1 sps 8 ch2 sps round 7 ch3 2 double_crochet ch2 3 double_crochet in same ch2 space as slip_stitch * ch1 3 double_crochet in each ch1 space to valley ch1 space ch1 single_crochet in next ch1 space ch1 3 double_crochet ch1 in each ch1 space across to hill ch2 space shell in ch2 space* repeat from * to * 7 times ch1 3 double_crochet in each ch1 space to valley ch1 space ch1 single_crochet in next ch1 space ch1 3 double_crochet ch1 in each ch1 space across to beg of round slip_stitch in top of beg ch3 and
